bug.author: qw2208
bug.summary: Official build version 5.0 for Linux does not include cxx_api.h and cxx_inline.h?
bug.description: Official build version 5.0 for Linux does not include cxx_api.h and cxx_inline.h?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/qw2208>@qw2208</denchmark-link> which official build? Nuget or zip/tarballs? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/RyanUnderhill>@RyanUnderhill</denchmark-link> I remember this was added. Wasn't it?
So did you put it in the official builds or should I wait for the release.
